title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Title: Walker's Razor Slim Shooting Earmuffs - High-Definition Sound, Rapid Response Compression

Description: Step up your hearing protection with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, engineered for precision auditory defense at the firing range. Experience natural sound clarity with a noise reduction rating (NRR) of 23 dB, tailored to safeguard your ears while maintaining environmental awareness.

These earmuffs boast dynamic high-definition speakers, offering crystal-clear audio, complemented by ultra-fast sound-activated compression with a reaction time of just 0.02 seconds. Each ear cup is equipped with its own independent volume control, allowing for a customized listening experience.

Integrated with dual omnidirectional microphones, the earmuffs capture and balance sounds from all directions. The inclusion of an audio input jack means you can connect external devices for an enhanced listening experience. Volume adjustment is a breeze with the recessed control knobs, designed to prevent accidental changes.

Crafted with a durable composite housing, these earmuffs effectively dampen harmful noises while the padded headband, featuring a sturdy metal wire frame, ensures a comfortable fit. The foldable design adds to their convenience, making them easy to store and transport.

Powered by 2 AAA batteries, included for immediate use, these lightweight earmuffs—weighing under a pound—promise comfort and protection without the bulk. With dimensions of 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches, they offer a compact solution for active shooters who value both safety and sound quality.

Title: Walker's Razor Slim Shooting Earmuffs

Description: Discover the perfect balance of protection and clarity with Walker's Razor Slim Hearing Protection Earmuffs. Engineered for the shooting enthusiast, these earmuffs feature advanced noise reduction with a 23 dB rating, ensuring safety without sacrificing sound quality. The high-definition speakers are tailored for dynamic range environments with a rapid sound-activated compression response time of just 0.02 seconds, accompanied by convenient independent volume controls.

Equipped with dual omnidirectional microphones, these earmuffs capture natural sound directionality, while the audio input jack allows for seamless connectivity. The low-profile design incorporates recessed volume knobs and a durable composite housing that effectively dampens harsh sounds.

Experience lasting comfort with the adjustable headband, complete with a sturdy metal wire frame that's designed to fold compactly for easy transport and storage. Powered by 2 AAA batteries, included in your purchase, these earmuffs are ready to use right out of the box.

Lightweight at just 0.98 pounds and measuring 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches, Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs offer a comfortable fit for extended wear, ensuring you stay focused and protected during your time on the range.

Title: Walker's Razor Slim Hearing Protection Earmuffs

Description: Step onto the range with confidence and clarity using the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Boasting a noise reduction rating (NRR) of 23 dB, these earmuffs integrate two omnidirectional microphones to capture and accurately reproduce ambient sounds. An audio input jack is available for connecting external devices, and the recessed volume control knobs prevent accidental adjustments. The earmuffs' durable composite housing contributes to their effective sound dampening capabilities.

Comfort isn't compromised, thanks to a padded headband with a metal wire frame that's adjustable and foldable for convenient transport and storage. Lightweight at just 0.98 pounds and measuring 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches, these earmuffs are designed for extended use without strain. To ensure immediate operation, 2 AAA batteries are included in the package. Choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs for a high-fidelity, comfortable, and safe shooting experience.

Title: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs – Precision Hearing Protection for Shooters

Description: Safeguard your hearing with precision using Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, designed for the avid shooter. Experience natural sound clarity coupled with superior safety features, thanks to a low noise/frequency tuning that doesn't compromise on your situational awareness.

Immerse yourself in the crisp audio delivered through high-definition speakers, all while benefitting from an ultra-fast sound-activated compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds. Independent volume controls let you adjust sound levels to your preference effortlessly.

Boasting a noise reduction rating (NRR) of 23 dB, these earmuffs are equipped with dual omnidirectional microphones, ensuring comprehensive sound coverage. The inclusion of an audio input jack and strategically recessed volume control knobs, wrapped in a durable composite housing, guarantee effective sound attenuation when it matters most.

Designed with your comfort in mind, the earmuffs feature a plush headband supported by a sturdy metal wire frame that conveniently folds for compact storage. Powered by 2 AAA batteries, which are included, these earmuffs are ready to perform right out of the box.

Lightweight at just 0.98 pounds and with dimensions of 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches, these earmuffs provide reliable protection without weighing you down, making them an essential accessory for any shooting enthusiast.

Title: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs – Precision Hearing Protection with HD Speakers

Description: Experience unparalleled auditory defense with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, expertly designed to enhance your shooting range sessions. With an advanced noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs are finely tuned to deliver natural sound clarity while offering robust safety features.

Immerse yourself in the clarity of dynamic high-definition speakers, ensuring that you never miss a beat. The rapid sound-activated compression reacts within 0.02 seconds, safeguarding your ears from sudden loud noises. Designed with your comfort in mind, the earmuffs boast a soft headband and a sturdy metal wire frame, foldable for compact storage. Utilizing 2 AAA batteries, included for immediate use, these earmuffs are ready to perform right out of the box.

With a lightweight design, at just 0.98 pounds, and measuring 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches, these earmuffs promise comfort and convenience without compromising on protection. Choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs for an enhanced shooting experience that keeps your hearing sharp and secure.

Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.
